text:
Not sure where to post this, but could we have the tooltip hover functionality of the deal tag matched in the middle pane view?
Hovering over the deal tag on the deal overview shows the description, but if you make a deal tag view on the middle pane and hover, it doesnâ€™t show anything.

Not sure if someone already mentioned this, but "context-sensitive" settings would be really cool as well, something  like with Smart Content, that  gives us the ability to get more to the flexibility of a Headless CMS.
